attributes.action: Stop people parking outside St Josephs school prospect street Halifax
attributes.additional_details: I have been to the Calderdale Council. They say they have reviewed the situation and they say it does not warrant any further investigation
attributes.background: People who work in Halifax town centre are parking outside the school. So when its drop off and pick up you can not park

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Parking restrictions are the responsibility of your local council.

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:
http://www.calderdale.gov.uk/council/consultations/petitions/index.html
